title: Caroline Flack and Lewis Burton are couple goals as they share a kiss
text:
Caroline admitted she once almost quit Love Island for a man (Picture: Splash)

Caroline Flack and boyfriend Lewis Burton share a romantic were spotted kissing during their holiday in Ibiza as they move on from a dramatic row.

The Love Island presenter was all over her new boyfriend after having an intense argument on a luxury yacht on Tuesday.

The 39-year-old made it official with Lewis back in August, sharing a string of loved-up photos.

Lewis and Caroline gazed lovingly at each other as a friend sat by them probably waiting for them to stop.

They shared a little embrace before they headed back to their hotel.

Lewis held on to Caroline’s beach bag like the true gentleman he is and, to be fair, he’s rocking it.

A few days ago, the pair appeared to have had a tense chat on board a yacht. Pictures showed the Love Island host seemingly unimpressed on the deck of the boat, while her tennis player beau, 27, spoke to her.

Their friend is having a great time (Picture: SplashNews.com)

Lewis looks great with a straw bag (Picture: SplashNews.com)

He could be seen trying to console the host as she gestured wildly at him.

Advertisement

Advertisement

It is not known exactly what their heated discussion was about, but at one point, the ITV2 star held up her phone to show him an alert on her screen.

The couple were joined on board the yacht by a group of their close pals, including Made In Chelsea star Ashley James.

Meanwhile, the presenter has been getting ready for the premiere of the upcoming winter Love Island.

She teased that the upcoming winter series of the dating show – which will sail onto our screens in early 2020 – will be the ‘hottest’ one yet.

‘I literally cannot wait, it is going to be so hot,’ she told The Sun. ‘Probably the hottest one yet. ‘Cape Town, can you believe it? Love Island’s twice a year now, it’s going to be mad.’

Maybe she was yelling at him about why we need two Love Islands every year.
